messages.subject: Re: Re: question
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/4/2003 4:51:18 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Well, that would have been my nightmare anyway....I HATED PE. Kathryn [Non-text portions of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/4/2003 4:51:18 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

> And an hour of P.E. EVERY day??? I haven't seen that in decades. It
> went out with elementary art and music classes and the before school free
> social playtime (early arrivals now have to SIT quietly in the lunchroom or on
> a hallway floor until the building "opens" for morning class). Liability
> concerns you know if they were allowed to play on the playscapes that PTAs
> or community volunteers provided.
>

Well, that would have been my nightmare anyway....I HATED PE.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
